description: This table contains record status information for the Plan of Care (POC) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant that the record status was changed.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who changed the record status.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the action that was applied to the record status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries:

Undo Delete
